main_definition: Not visible or not easily noticeable, often intentionally concealed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not openly displayed or accessible; kept secret or confidential.
meanings_and_examples.example: The hidden agenda of the meeting was to discuss layoffs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concealed within an object, out of sight but still present.
meanings_and_examples.example: She found a small note tucked away in the pages of her book.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not immediately apparent or evident; not obvious to the eye or mind.
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist's painting had hidden details that only became clear upon close examination.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Intentionally obscured, covered up or kept out of sight.
meanings_and_examples.example: He hid his true feelings behind a smile.
